Project Documentation

  • Project Reports

cxx:make

Full name:

org.codehaus.mojo:cxx-maven-plugin:0.0.5-SNAPSHOT:make

Description:

Goal which makes workspace.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven 2.0 project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: compile.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
commandArgs String 0.0.4 Arguments for the executed program
environmentVariables Map 0.0.4 Environment variables to pass to the cmake program.
makecommandPerOS Map 0.0.4 make commands names per OS name os name match is java.lang.System.getProperty("os.name")
project MavenProject - Projet en cours de deploiement.
projectDir File 0.0.4 directory location where make will execute

Parameter Details

commandArgs:

Arguments for the executed program
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 0.0.4
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${make.args}

environmentVariables:

Environment variables to pass to the cmake program.
  • Type: java.util.Map
  • Since: 0.0.4
  • Required: No

makecommandPerOS:

make commands names per OS name os name match is java.lang.System.getProperty("os.name")
  • Type: java.util.Map
  • Since: 0.0.4
  • Required: No

project:

Projet en cours de deploiement.
  • Type: org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${project}

projectDir:

directory location where make will execute
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 0.0.4
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${make.projectdir}
